roles.title: Software Engineer : financial systems
roles.stack: Python, Django, React, GCP, Bigquery, JS, SQL, , Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes

roles.title: Senior Data Analyst : General Ledger
roles.description: At JP Morgan as an Analyst, I was responsible for the maintenance of the General Ledger data pipeline. I was in charge of the reconciliation process between the General Ledger and the sub-ledgers. I have developed operational dashboards to monitor data quality and to provide insights to the business. I have lead automation projects for our daily operations and succesfully deployed them to allthe teams in the US/India/Poland.
roles.stack: AWS, VBA, Python, Docker, SQL, Tableau

roles.title: Junior FP&A Analyst
roles.description: Performed on a monthly basis: Cost follow up analysis,  material performance analysis, stock analysis, inventory analysis,item. Designed Dashboards on Tableau to have interactive monitoring on raw material productivity with production. Saved 3h of working hours for management weekly, design improvement and kept the data up to date everyday. I created small scale automations on VBA and Python on existing processes for my position e.g Scheduled data extraction from SAP ERP on a daily basis. Created macros to update excel files automatically. Limited human errors and saved up to 2h daily.
